item.title: DeepSeek 为中国科技巨头的复兴带来希望
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的崛起正迫使投资者重新评估中国领先的互联网公司及其利用人工智能的潜力，而人工智能已推动全球同行的发展。【原文：The rise of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is forcing investors to re-evaluate the nation’s leading internet companies and their potential to capitalize on artificial intelligence that’s boosted global peers.】

item.title: T-Mobile 将对 Starlink 卫星短信功能每月收费 15 美元
item.description: T-Mobile US Inc. 周日表示，该公司与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链（Starlink）卫星合作，为用户提供离网短信和数据服务，在免费测试期结束后，用户每月需支付 15 美元。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc.’s tie-up with Elon Musk’s Starlink satellites for texting and data usage off the grid will cost customers $15 a month after a free testing period, the carrier said Sunday.】

item.title: 金价逼近 3,000 美元，中国黄金买家被迫观望
item.description: 黄金飙升至每盎司 3,000 美元附近，有可能将中国的买家抛在后面。【原文：Gold’s scorching rally to near $3,000 an ounce threatens to leave buyers in China behind.】

item.title: 失业担忧阻碍英国消费繁荣
item.description: 英国工人越来越担心失去工作，这阻碍了经济从潜在的消费升级中受益。【原文：British workers are increasingly worried about losing their jobs, and it’s preventing the economy from benefiting from a potential uplift in consumer spending.】

item.title: 市场权衡特朗普关税，石油在周度下跌后企稳
item.description: 由于市场权衡了唐纳德-特朗普总统持续征收关税的影响，石油价格在连续一周下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a string of weekly declines as the market weighed the fallout from President Donald Trump’s ongoing tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普钢铁言论引发美元上涨，贸易担忧加剧
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统表示将宣布对进口钢铁和铝征收关税后，美元对大多数主要货币汇率反弹，刺激了对这一储备货币的再次抢购。【原文：The dollar rallied against most major currencies after President Donald Trump said he would announce tariffs on steel and aluminum imports, spurring a renewed rush to the reserve currency.】

item.title: 慧科审议两起针对前首席执行官怀特的新投诉
item.description: WiseTech Global Ltd. 的董事会正在评估两起针对该公司创始人兼前首席执行官理查德-怀特（Richard White）的秘密投诉。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd.’s board is assessing two confidential complaints about the company’s founder and former chief executive officer, Richard White, almost four months after he was forced to step aside following a series of media reports about his conduct.】

item.title: 中美贸易紧张局势加剧令吉表现面临风险
item.description: 在与美国的贸易战中，马来西亚最大贸易伙伴的增长前景进一步暗淡，这将使林吉特在过去一年中的优异表现经受考验。【原文：The ringgit’s outperformance over the past year is set to be tested as the growth outlook of Malaysia’s largest trading partner further dims amid a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 星展集团盈利符合预期，将开始派发资本回报股息
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）公布的第四季度利润符合预期，主要受财富管理费和贷款收益的推动，同时该银行宣布了资本回报支付。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. reported fourth-quarter profit that met expectations, buoyed by wealth fees and gains in lending, as the bank announced a capital-return payout.】

item.title: 商品货币因特朗普关税计划而下滑：市场综述
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺对所有进口钢铁和铝征收关税，并计划在本周晚些时候采取其他措施之后，亚洲市场将震荡开盘。商品货币在早盘交易中下跌，而亚洲股市则可能下跌。【原文：Asian markets are set for a shaky open after President Donald Trump pledged tariffs on all imports of steel and aluminum, on top of his plan for other measures later this week. Commodity currencies dropped in early trading while Asian stocks are primed for losses.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 谷物交易商将在周二关注美国农业部月度供需预估的最新情况。全球顶级金矿公司将于周三拉开季度财报季的序幕，巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普上任以来，石油的下跌具有历史意义。【原文：Grains traders will be watching Tuesday for the latest insights from the US Department of Agriculture’s monthly supply-and-demand estimates. The world’s top gold miners kick off their quarterly earnings season, starting Wednesday with Barrick Gold Corp. And oil’s drop since US President Donald Trump took office carries historical significance.】

item.title: 特朗普暗示马斯克在美国国债中发现 "违规行为
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暗示，埃隆-马斯克的政府效率团队发现了美国国债中的违规行为，并暗示这可能导致美国无视某些违规行为。【原文：President Donald Trump suggested that Elon Musk’s government efficiency team has found irregularities in US treasuries, and intimated that may lead the US to disregard some.】

item.title: 特朗普计划周一公布 25% 的钢铁和铝关税税率
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将于周一宣布对所有进口钢铁和铝征收 25% 的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said he will announce 25% tariffs on all imports of steel and aluminum on Monday.】

item.title: Chipotle 的牛油果烦恼可能也是你的烦恼
item.description:
卷饼连锁店首席财务官谈论关税和通货膨胀。此外，我们还将探讨为什么可转换债务在当前是合理的。【原文：

The burrito chain’s CFO talks tariffs and inflation. Plus, a look at why convertible debt makes sense right now.

】

item.title: 石破茂和特朗普的暖意令日本投资者如释重负
item.description: 周一，日本首相石破茂在避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出任何新要求后返回东京，日本市场上周五弥漫的紧张情绪转为松了一口气。【原文：The nervousness that pervaded Japanese markets on Friday turned to a sigh of relief Monday as Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba returned to Tokyo after avoiding any new demands from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 激进投资者埃利奥特加入战局，英国石油公司面临关键时刻
item.description: 与其他石油巨头相比，英国石油公司（BP Plc）的业绩严重不佳，目前已到了紧要关头，即将与全球最激进的激进投资者之一摊牌。【原文：BP Plc’s dramatic under-performance compared with other oil majors has reached a crunch point — a looming showdown with one of the world’s most aggressive activist investors.】

item.title: Pimco 寻求通过亚洲扩张将 60/40 基金规模扩大至 20 亿美元
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. is seeking to grow assets in a multi-asset mutual fund by 25% to $2 billion this year, betting that a 60/40 equity-debt split will attract more investors in Asia.】

item.title: 法国将宣布 1090 亿欧元的新人工智能投资计划
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙在巴黎举行的为期两天的人工智能峰会前夕表示，法国将宣布在未来几年内由公司、基金和其他来源对本国的人工智能项目进行总额达1090亿欧元（约合1130亿美元）的投资。【原文：France is set to announce a total of €109 billion ($113 billion) in investment in artificial intelligence projects in the country by companies, funds and other sources over coming years, President Emmanuel Macron said on the eve of a two-day AI summit in Paris.】

item.title: 特朗普和通胀令收益率持续走高，债券市场涨势渐消
item.description: 对于美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）来说，10 年期国债收益率是衡量唐纳德-特朗普总统降低利率目标的关键指标。【原文：To US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, the yield on 10-year government debt is the key gauge for President Donald Trump’s goal of getting lower interest rates.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德将斥资 200 亿欧元建设法国人工智能基础设施
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）计划在未来五年内投资 200 亿欧元（约合 207 亿美元），在法国开发数据中心和人工智能基础设施。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management plans to invest €20 billion ($20.7 billion) to develop data centers and AI infrastructure in France over the next five years, as the competition to dominate artificial intelligence intensifies among global powers.】

item.title: 意大利精英成为骗子利用人工智能语音冒充的目标
item.description: 骗子利用人工智能语音工具冒充意大利国防部长吉多-克罗塞托及其工作人员，试图说服该国一些顶级商人向海外汇款。【原文：Scammers used an artificial intelligence voice tool to impersonate Italy’s Defense Minister Guido Crosetto and his staff in an attempt to persuade some of the nation’s top businessmen to wire money overseas.】

item.title: 福尔哈报》称巴西为美国关税和贸易战做准备
item.description: 据《圣保罗页报》（Folha de S. Paulo）报道，巴西政府正在规划可能受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发起的贸易战影响的经济部门，以及南美国家在美国征收关税的情况下可以采取的措施。【原文：Brazil’s government is mapping out sectors of the economy that could be affected by a trade war launched by US President Donald Trump as well as measures the South American nation can adopt in case of tariffs imposed by the US, Folha de S. Paulo reported.】

item.title: 特朗普的第二任期需要股票投资者的新游戏规则
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对其标志性关税采取的反复无常的态度上周令市场大跌眼镜。投资者试图对自己的股票投资组合进行定位，以应对这种持续的不确定性，但他们发现，特朗普第一任期的那套打法帮不上什么忙。【原文：President Donald Trump’s mercurial approach to his signature tariffs whipsawed markets last week. And investors trying to position their equity portfolios to manage this ongoing uncertainty are finding the playbook from his first term offers little help.】

item.title: 关税风险笼罩东欧特朗普引发的市场反弹
item.description: 匈牙利的维克托-欧尔班被美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称赞为 "强硬 "和 "聪明"，他是希望对美国的忠诚能转化为交易和经济收益的东欧领导人之一。相反，他们可能会发现自己的金融市场无法逃脱美欧贸易战的更广泛影响。【原文：Lauded as “tough” and “smart” by President Donald Trump, Hungary’s Viktor Orban is among the eastern European leaders hoping that allegiance to the US will translate into deals and economic gains. Instead, they may find their financial markets cannot escape the wider fallout of a US-Europe trade war.】

item.title: 苹果新款 iPhone SE 将开启产品线关键的一年
item.description: 苹果公司即将推出的 iPhone SE 改版机将为其智能手机阵容拉开关键性一年的序幕。此外：公司加大了家用机器人的招聘力度，准备开设新的零售店，并扩大了订阅服务。【原文：Apple’s upcoming iPhone SE revamp will kick off a pivotal year for its smartphone lineup. Also: The company ramps up hiring for work on home robotics, prepares to open new retail stores and expands its subscription offerings.】

item.title: 扎姆拉齐洛娃称通胀风险阻碍捷克更快降息
item.description: 捷克央行副行长伊娃-扎姆拉齐洛娃（Eva Zamrazilova）表示，捷克央行必须谨慎推进进一步的货币宽松政策，因为持续的通胀风险超过了疲软的经济增长。【原文：The Czech central bank must proceed cautiously with further monetary easing because persistent inflation risks are outweighing sluggish economic growth, according to Vice Governor Eva Zamrazilova.】

item.title: 瑞士选民因经济问题拒绝接受排放限制
item.description: 瑞士选民在全民公决中否决了一套严格的排放限制，驳回了加强气候保护的呼吁，因为他们担心这会阻碍经济发展。【原文：Swiss voters rejected a set of rigid emission limits in a plebiscite, dismissing a call for more climate protection over fears that it would stymie the economy.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂在首次峰会上展示如何与特朗普合作
item.description: 日本首相石破茂与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普举行了首次首脑会谈，东京方面担心日本可能继加拿大等国之后成为美国盟友的下一个目标。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba went into his first summit meeting with US President Donald Trump amid concerns in Tokyo that Japan could be next in the firing line of US allies after Canada and others.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织与埃塞俄比亚债务重组谈判即将结束
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）表示，埃塞俄比亚在 20 国集团共同框架下的债务重组谈判已接近尾声。【原文：Ethiopia is nearing the end of debt restructuring talks under the Group of 20’s Common Framework, according to International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva.】

item.title: 报告称，越来越多的澳大利亚退休人员难以支付房租
item.description: 一份针对准备就住房和生活费用问题进行选举的立法者的新报告称，越来越多的澳大利亚退休人员因付不起房租而面临无家可归的风险。【原文：A growing number of Australian retirees risk falling into homelessness because they can’t afford to pay rent, said a new report aimed at lawmakers preparing to fight an election on housing and cost-of-living.】
